translations: adj.穿袜的；穿袜而未穿鞋的

sentences.sentence: He tip-toed to the door in his stockinged feet.
sentences.translation: 他只穿着袜子踮着脚尖走到门口。

sentences.sentence: But later, at her residence, when she curls her stockinged feet under her, she admits the wider crisis.
sentences.translation: 但是后来，在他的住处，他承认存在着广泛的危机。
